channel.description: Recent content in quarto on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Quartaki - Introduction to Quarto
item.description: Workshop: A 6 hour introduction to Quarto for report generation in R. Combining code with prose to create reports in a seamless environment. This workshop is taught with RStudio and R, but learners proficient in other compatible languages are welcome to join.
